name: Quest for Eternity
overview: It's your chance to become an Overlord of the Universe. Yes it's your time to take the test. Failure means a fate worse than death...A visit from the Batlegroms of Vragus IV...It's simple really, all you have to do is get a disused teleportal booth to work. Unfortunately it's 2000 light years away on a slightly hostile planet. David Cockram has designed this twister, which will accept 99 verbs and 162 nouns. Take the challenge. You too can become a Master of the Eternity.
